thread.title: Amy Schumer blasts Kardashians for being bad role models
thread.title_full: Amy Schumer blasts Kardashians for being bad role models

title: Amy Schumer blasts Kardashians for being bad role models
text:
Amy Schumer blasts Kardashians for being bad role models 12th Oct 2015 5:00 PM Cars For Sale 
AMY Schumer has blasted the Kardashians. 
The 'Trainwreck' actress took aim at the reality TV family as she hosted 'Saturday Night Live' for the first time on Saturday, lambasting them for their obsession with their looks and calling them bad role models. 
Speaking about the need to have good role models for young women, she said: "We have to be a role model for these little girls, because who do they have? All they have really is the Kardashians. Is that a great message for little girls? A whole family of women who take faces they were born with as a light suggestion?" 
Amy also referenced Khloe Kardashian's dramatic weight loss, claiming that Khloe used to be the most down to earth of the family before she "lost half her body weight". 
She added: "We used to have Khloe. Khloe was ours, right? Whenever there's a group of women, you identify with one of them...but then Khloe, she lost half her body weight. She lost a Kendall! We have nothing. I want good role models." 
During the hilarious opening monologue, Amy also joked she is dating Bradley Cooper and recalled a conversation with Hillary Clinton, where she asked the politician about her alcohol preferences. amy schumer
